item.description:
Icubators it's time to organize a trip!!!!

This upcoming weekend I would like to head out to the Davis Farmland in Sterling, MA to get lost with you all in there exciting corn field MAZE!!!!

http://www.davisfarml...

I've been out there in years past and its quite a fun time. I mean the basics is its a giant maze and you have to get from start to finish but there's several other challenges to make it more difficult, like collecting various clues and other random funness!!! Overall, I was thinking we could split into groups and see who makes it out first after completing everything, which could take upwards of 3 hours but probably less.

What a better way to spend one of the last warmer weekends of the fall. It's still suppose to be in the 50s all weekend.

The cost is $17 a person but if we can organize a group of 20 before Sunday, we can all go for only $10.

So let's see if we can make this happen. Pass along to friends and let's get it going. Obviously the biggest hurdle is finding some people to drive. So if you have a car and are willing to drive, please rsvp and let me know asap. I'm sure your fellow incubators would be willing to split up the gas cost as well.

Any other thoughts or questions? Let me know.

Rock on! and Let's be aMAZEing.

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be lost in the maze, find me!
item.name: Kickin It Social Style Part 2: Davis Farmland MegaMaze!!!!
